quizlist.question: What are the 3 ways styling can be added to HTML elements?
quizlist.option1: Inline - using a style attribute in HTML elements
quizlist.option2: External - using one or more external html files
quizlist.option3: Internal - using a style element in the HTML body section

quizlist.question: How do you seperate multiple styles within an elemnt?
quizlist.option1: Multiple styles are separated with semicolon.
quizlist.option2: Multiple styles are separated with comma
quizlist.option3: styles are separated by a new file
